title: Himi 175
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Ka ko ho’ pekia, ‘Eiki,
Ko hoku faka’ilonga;
Koe’uhi, ke u lava’i
‘I ho Laumālie tapu;
Pea u fai ‘o angatonu,
‘O a’u ki he’eku mate.
2.
Pea ‘i he’eku ma’a
‘I he hia kotoa pē,
Pea hoko ‘eku anga
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona;
Pea u toki ma’u mo’oni,
‘A e kalauni mo’ui.
3.
‘E hoko kiate koe,
‘Eiki, ‘a ho’ kau mamahi
‘O loto haohaoa,
Pea ngāue angatonu;
Pea hao ‘i he mate,
Pea lava ki he lelei.
4.
Pea ko e hala eni,
‘Oku taki tonu atu,
‘A ho kakai fa’a kātaki,
Ki ho’o ngaahi nofo’anga;
Kuo tuku ‘i ‘olunga,
Ki he kakai loto ma’a.
5.
Pea u tali teuteu atu,
‘I he ‘ofa mo’onia;
Ki he ‘eku hiki hake,
Mei he tafungofunga;
Ko Kalevale mamahi,
Ki ‘olunga, ki Saione. *
